name: ENJOY PET Heated Cat Bed Indoor, 12 Level Temperature Dog Cat Heating Pad with Timer, Pet Heating Pad for Puppy Cats Dogs Electric Warming Pad, Chew Resistant Heated Pet Bed (18" x 18")
short_description: 12 Level Timer and Temperature Settings: ENJOY PET electric pet heating pad can set 1-12 hours timer auto-off, support “Always ON” function for your furry friends’ whole day needs. Adjustable temperature from 86℉ to 141℉with temperature digital display, 5℉ higher or lower per level, allows you to customize the temperature your puppies like, rather than just low, medium or high

Safe and Secure Structure: The heated pet bed have a 8-layer protective structure, the inner cover of the cat heating pad with timer is made of durable oxford fabric, scratch-proof and waterproof, easy to clean. In addition, the heated cat bed uses UL-certified heating wire to protect pets(dog, cat, rabbit, etc.) from burns

Reinforced Steel-wrapped Cord: Our heated dog bed has extended 1.8 m/6 ft chew-resistant steel cord which prevents cats from biting. Longer cord is more flexible for indoor use, also with tight joint to avoid electric leakage

Soft Contact & Even Heating: The removable velvet outer cover is ultra soft and thick to provide your pets a comfortable rest. The electric heating pad for pets has dense spiral heating wire with higher power, heating more quickly to make your pets get warm soon. NOTE : When your pet is not on the pad, it cannot feel warm by touch; when your pet is laying on it, the heat is tangible

Health Care for Your Pets: This heated pet pad with timer can be used in cat bed or dog bed, pet houses and nests, suitable for newborn pets, older pets, pregnant pets, arthritic pets or pets recovering from illness or injury. Provide warm care for them during cold winters

name: INVENHO Heated Cat Bed, Waterproof Adjustable Temperature Dog Cat Heating Pad with Timer, Indoor Pet Heating Pad for Cats Dogs Electric Pads for Dogs Cats, Pet Heated Pad (S: 18" x 16")
short_description: 🐶Upgraded Temperature Adjustable Function: Our pet heating pad has 11 levels of adjustable temperature setting, and 5℉/2.8℃ higher than most other heating pads. Controlling the temperature of electric dog heating pad with the LED controller, it can adjust the temperature easily with 11 temperature settings ( 80-130℉/26.6-54.5℃) to accommodate your pets. It effectively keeps your pets toasty warm in autumn and winter days.

🐶Unique Safety Design: In order to prevent dogs from biting the wire and getting electrocuted, the wire is wrapped by spiral chewy cover. 7-layer protective structure with UL-certified heating wire protect pets from burns. Soft PVC envelope with waterproof and flame-retardant function. Built-in intelligent temperature sensor in the heating pad to prevent overheating to protect pets. Don’t let your pets lay on the pet heating pad without a plush cover.

🐶Pet Heating Pad with Timer: The electric pads for cats with timer function provide auto shut-off range from 1 to 24 hours, conserve energy and prevent burns caused by excessive heating. The timer LED will be shifted down one level to tell you how much time is left.

🐶Removable and Washable Cover: The cover of this pet heated mat is made of super soft, machine washable Flannel material and exterior is designed as corn kernel shape makes it durable for long time use. The cover is equipped with a zip that allows the cover to be easily removed and machine washed.

🐶Anti-Overheating function: Equipped with an upgraded thermostat, this pet heating mat can exactly control the temperature and automatically power off when it reaches the setting time, make your pet safer and more comfortable.

🐶Good for Pet's Health: INVENHO pet heating pad can warm newborn pets, pregnant pets and ease joint pressure and pain of older, arthritic animals. If you have any questions about products, please feel free to contact us, we will always be ready to serve you.

name: Bedsure Waterproof Dog Blankets for Small Dogs - Small Cat Blanket Washable for Couch Protection, Sherpa Fleece Puppy Blanket, Soft Plush Reversible Throw Furniture Protector, 25"X35", Grey
short_description: Warm & Cozy Blanket: Dog blanket is lined with warm Sherpa on one side and flannel fleece on the other. Waterproof pet blanket prevents humidity and cold, keeping your cats and dogs comfortable and warm.

Waterproof & Leakproof Design: Featuring a central waterproof membrane, this blanket effectively prevents liquid from leaking in either direction—whether from the flannel fleece side to the Sherpa side, or vice versa. Your furniture stays dry, no matter how you place it.

Double-sided Reversible：Featuring warming, fluffy sherpa on one side and soft flannel fleece on the other. Reinforced with tight stitching for secure construction and lasting comfort. Sherpa lining and flannel fleece are not waterproof.

An Extra Protection: Bedsure pet blankets can protect your couch and flooring from spills, pet hair, stains and so much more.The lightweight and convenient design allows you to take a blanket to the beach, travel, hotel, camping.

Easy Care & Portable ：Machine wash cold, tumble dry on low heat, and consider using wool dryer balls to shorten drying time—flipping the blanket every 30 to 45 minutes will also help ensure it dries evenly. Its portable design makes it easy to move between rooms or take with you on the go.

name: BECEMURU Pet Heating Pad for Dogs & Cats, 18x16 in, Waterproof Heated Bed with 6-Temp & Timer, Chew-Resistant Cord Electric Warm Bed for Senior Pets, Soothing Pain Relief for Arthritis
short_description: 【Adjustable Temperature with Ease】Easily control the warmth of the dog heating pad using the LED controller, with 6 gears temperature settings (86–131°F / 30–55°C) to keep your pet cozy in any season.Ideal for use during arthritis, recovery, or as a cozy everyday warming bed.

【Energy-Saving Auto Shut-Off Timer — Safe for Day & Night Use】Ideal for senior pets or busy pet parents, this pet heating pad features a 4-level timer (4/8/12/24H) for automatic shut-off. Set it for overnight comfort, during work hours, or for post-surgery warmth—it saves energy and prevents overheating risks, giving you peace of mind. The LED indicator clearly shows remaining time.

【Safety and Secure Structure】7-layer protective structure with UL-certified heating wire protect pets from burns. Soft PVC envelope with waterproof and flame-retardant function. Built-in intelligent temperature sensor in the heating pad to prevent overheating to protect pets. Don’t let your pets lay on the pet heating pad without a plush cover

【Chew-Resistant & Easy to Clean — Built for Active Dogs & Cats】Designed for real life with pets, our dog heating pad includes a dual-protection cord that resists chewing. The machine-washable cover and wipe-clean inner mat handle accidents, muddy paws, or shedding with ease, making this cat heating pad both durable and simple to maintain for long-term use.

【Best Gift for Your Lovely Pets & 1-Year Warranty】Available in sizes S (18"x16"), M (24"x18"), L(30"x18")and XL (36"x24"), this heated pet bed is suitable for all animals, including dogs, cats, rabbits, and animals requiring special care, such as newborns, seniors, injured animals, or pregnant animals.

【Keep Flat During Use — Designed for Beds, Crates & Recovery Areas】To ensure consistent warmth and safety, always use this pet heating pad flat in your pet’s favorite rest area. Whether placed in a dog bed, a cat condo, or a recovery crate, keeping it unfolded prevents hot spots and extends product life—perfect for daily comfort in your pet’s dedicated space.

name: Bestio Large Dog Heating Pad,34x21 in Heated Dog Bed with Constant Heat & Auto Modes，MET&UL Certified Pet Heating Pad with Soothing Warmth,Chew-Resistant Cord,Waterproof Washable Cover-Gray
short_description: 【Pet Heating Pad】 Our dog heating pad is 34 x 21 inches,which is perfect for heated dog beds for large dogs. Equipped with upgraded LCD screen switch with ON constant on function, electric heating wire rope and power port reinforced design, all-round safety and warmth for your pet, comes with super soft suede protective cover.

【Upgraded Switch】This heating pad for dogs adopts upgraded LCD display, you can view the temperature and time at the same time, provides 80-130℉ temperature control range, supports 1-24 hours free adjustment, new normally open ON function. The heating pad for pets is also equipped with power failure protection, designed for pets to avoid overheating, thus providing just the right amount of warmth for your pet.

【Safety Structure Design】The pet heating pad is designed with 8 layers of protective structure, double helix heating wire, it can be heated up quickly in about 10 minutes, built-in UL certified electric heating wire and temperature sensor, it also adds waterproof and flame-retardant inner layer, and the carabiner reinforcement at the wire connection prevents it from being damaged by pets, you don't need to worry about leakage of electricity.

【Soft Cotton Cloth Cover】A skin-friendly soft fleece fabric carefully selected and sourced by Bestio team, customised with a cute dog bone pattern, more suitable for our beloved pets to use, and the warm cloth cover can isolate the cold floor in the cold winter. The removable washable design effectively keeps the pad surface clean and prolongs its service life.

【Multi-size, Multi-scene】Bestio pet heating pads are available in 6 sizes, suitable for newborn kittens, puppies, and medium and large dogs. Support multi-scene use: can be placed on the sofa in the living room, heated dog house, whelping box for dogs, etc.; It can also help relieve joint and muscle pain in older pets with arthritis during the cold winter, and provide warm care for newborn puppies, pregnant, and pets recovering from surgery.

【After-sale Guarantee】When you buy our dog heating pad, you can enjoy 1 year warranty. In the process of use, if you have any questions, please feel free to contact our Bestio after-sales team, we will do our best to protect your rights and interests, thank you for your trust and support. name: K&H Pet Products Bolster Heated Cat Bed for Indoor Cats, Thermo-Kitty Fashion Splash Orthopedic Foam Heated Pet Bed for Cats or Dogs, Waterproof Pet Heater, Safety Listed Small 18in Round Blue
short_description: HEATED CAT BED: Heated cat bed features a soft orthopedic foam base and over-stuffed bolsters for security and comfort
OPTIMAL TERMPERATURE: Electric heated cat bed is thermostatically controlled to automatically warm to your cat's normal body temperature only when your kitty is in the heated pet bed
ENERGY EFFICIENT: Heated cat bed is low wattage and extremely energy efficient; the thermostatically controlled K&H Pet Bed Warmer is removable for use in all seasons
MACHINE WASHABLE: K&H Thermo-Kitty fashion splash heated cat bed features a removable cover for easy wash and care
SAFETY: K&H doesn't just use safety listed parts, we safety certify the entire product. This heated cat bed has been tested & certified by MET Labs and exceeds USA/CA electrical safety standards
SIZING: The K&H Thermo-Kitty Fashion Splash is available in two colors and sizes; both sizes come in blue and mocha, the small measures 18" in diameter, and the large measures 16" x 22"

HOW IT WORKS: This heated bed may NOT feel warm to the touch when your pet is NOT in the bed; it emits a small amount of heat when not in use (pets can sense it), but only warms to max temperature when your pet is using the bed - see “How to Test” image
BRAND YOU TRUST: Designed by K&H with OVER 20 years of experience in creating safe, innovative, quality products for pets
product_description: Some cool cats are just too hip for a regular bed. That’s why we’ve introduced the Thermo-Kitty Fashion Splash! It’s available in two sizes and two colors. The 16” x 22” larger size can accommodate 2 kitties! These beds have an orthopedic foam base surrounded by an overstuffed polyfil bolster. Cats will find this comfy bed irresistible with its cozy warmth. The Thermo-Kitty Fashion Splash has a removable, energy-efficient heater and the cover is machine washable. Safety is our priority at K&H; we don't just use safety listed parts as safe parts don't mean they are put together correctly. We certify the entire product to ensure your safety - K&H Pet Products are tested & certified by MET Labs to exceed USA/CA electrical safety standards..

name: Heated Cat Beds for Indoor Cats and Small Dogs, 24'' Heated Pet Bed with Timer and Temp Adjustable, Cozy Fluffy Round Calming Pet Beds Removable Washable Cover USB Electric Warm Cat Bed- Light Gray
short_description: 【All-Season Adjustable Warmth & Timer】: Our heated cat bed indoor offers 4 temperature levels (95–122°F / 35–50°C), 3 timer options, and a always on mode making it ideal for all-day comfort-all easily controlled with the LED controller. The removable heating pad can be stored during warmer months, making it a versatile, year-round cozy bed for your cat.

【USB Energy-Saving & Portable】: SXBSXB upgraded heated cat bed features a USB low-power pet heating pad for safe and efficient warmth. For optimal performance, connect to a 5V/2A power bank or adapter for 2 in 1 use. Ideal for heated cat beds for indoor cats, perfect for home, office, or car seats to keep your pet cozy anywhere in winter.

【Removable & Washable Cat Bed】: The warming cat bed is fully machine washable—simply remove the heater and toss the heated pet beds into the washer. It stays soft and fresh after every wash. For best care, use a laundry bag on a cold, gentle cycle and tumble dry low, then fluff to restore its plush loft.

【Chew-Proof & Overheat Protection】: Your pet’s safety comes first. This heating pet bed uses a spiral chew-resistant cord to prevent bites and electric shock. The 8-layer protective structure, waterproof PVC cover and built-in thermostat with overheat protection ensure consistent, safe warmth. Size: 24"x16"x6", ideal for most cats and small dogs.

【Soothing Support & Deep Sleep】: The round donut cat bed with a 6-inch raised rim supports your pet’s head and neck, while the ultra-soft plush base provides cushioning for deep relaxation. The nest-like fluffy cat sleeping bed design offers security and comfort, helping cats and small dogs drift into peaceful, restful sleep.
